creator: daniel.wheeler@big-baseball.com
text: After uninstalling Apache 1.3.26 and putting a clean install of 2.0.39 on my server, server (Win2000 SP2 with all M$ support patches) would blue screen with a "process has locked pages" error within 10 minutes of system start (happened total of four times, each time was within 9-10 minutes, precisely).  After several reboots and bouts of swearing later, I discovered that if I did not start my firewall, ZoneAlarm Pro 3.0.118 (installed and working fine for 3 months), there would be no blue screen.  To make sure I ran system without Apache started and ZoneAlarm running and there were no crashes, when Apache started blue screen would come back within the 9-10 minute range.

creator: thom@planetarytramp.net
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 7932 ***
